scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Holy Trinity, with God the Father, crowned and robed in gold and blue, seated on a throne. He holds the crucified Christ, whose body bears wounds and is draped in a white loincloth. A dove, representing the Holy Spirit, hovers between them. Surrounding them are multiple figures with blue faces and wings, likely representing angels. The figures are set against a blue background with golden rays, suggesting a divine or heavenly realm. Below the figures, a text in Latin is visible, illuminated with decorative initials.
